answers.answer: I hope not because I've been stressing a lot lately h noticed I've gained the most weight I have during my whole pregnancy too. How far along are you?

You might have pre-eclampsia and this may mean you might be get induced which will be why your doc wants you in the city, don't worry too much though as the doc knows what's best for you and your baby :)
She may be worried that you have preeclampsia. Those are two signs of it, but you should call and see what she was so concerned about before you start freaking out even more.
Im 35 weeks I have just 33 days to go... I hope its nothing because I would of thought that if she suspected I have preeclampsia she would tell me hey u have preeclampsia or something like that

I think ill definitely start to pack my stuff I have my husband's and baby's bag ready to go I just need to gather my things up.. im just sad ill be away from my hubby earlier than expected he'll join me later because of his job but it will be worth it all for my baby

question: Today I went in for a regular prenatal check up turns out my pressure was over the roof and my doctor wouldn't let me leave until it went down she suggested for me to leave asap to the city where im going to give birth because its 3hrs away and she wants me to get settled before anything can happen she also told me I had gained 5lbs since my last visit which was two weeks ago (thats the most I've gained in between visits) I'm starting to get worried nothing like this had happened b4 so far everything was normal..could it be im stressing too much?
title: A bit worried.....
